text: Huntington is a city in the state of Indiana, in the United States. Major employers include UTEC (United Technologies Electronic Controls) and Continental Structural Plastics. In the early 2016, UTEC announced plans to move about 700 of its roughly 800 positions to Mexico.Slater, Sherry (2016) "UTEC Cutting 700 Huntington Jobs. Work Moving to Mexico; 100 Jobs to Remain," The Journal Gazette, February 11, 2016 ==References== Category:Cities in Indiana Category:County seats in Indiana
title: Huntington, Indiana
